explains: n. 旅行指南；指南，手册

sentences.en: Visitors to the castle had to fork out for a guidebook.
sentences.cn: 参观城堡的游客得为一本旅游指南掏很多钱。

sentences.en: The guidebook says to turn left.
sentences.cn: 旅游指南上说应向左拐。

sentences.en: The guidebook warns against walking alone at night.
sentences.cn: 这本指南告诫夜间不要单独行走。
